xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} #set($input = $request.get("input").toLowerCase()) #set($discard = $response.setContentType("text/xml")) <results> ## We're hardcoding the document name because all the attachments will be on that document #set($attachments = $xwiki.getDocument('Admin.FarmImporter').getAttachmentList()) #foreach($attachment in $attachments) #set($attachmentName = $attachment.getFilename()) #if($attachmentName.contains("${input}")) <rs id="1">$attachmentName</rs> #end #end </results> {{/velocity}}
